participant_decisions.sent: We need a large energy source, perhaps a "lifetime" battery (with "lifetime" really being 5-10 years at which point remote will be obsolete anyways) .
Fewer buttons on the user interface to make it easier to use, maybe just have button for power, channels, volume and leave the rest off.
Perhaps use some sort of voice recognition device to cut down on button use .
Have colorful interchangable covers which still incorporate company logo.

participant_problems.sent: Power source - what kind of power source and where will it come from and how long will it last.
Remote range - should be able to change channels from anywhere in the room, how do you design a large range.
